thread.section_title: The Knife Merchant, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Knife Merchant, Inc | www.knifemerchant.com | 2 of 68
thread.title: Tyler Kibjis:
thread.title_full: The Knife Merchant, Inc reviewed by Tyler Kibjis:

author: Tyler 	Kibjis:
title: Tyler Kibjis:
text: Fast delivery, within 4 days or so. Good price and quality, only dissatisfaction (if you could call it that) was the lid for the knife box was made from flimsy cardboard (bordering on paper quality). I have other knives from the same set with a solid/sturdy cardboard lid.
